kontext:
HAPPY
FRIENDSHIP
DAY
‘‘ A best friend backs you up,
gets on well with you and loves
you all the time.’’
We are organizing
a meeting for Friendship Day.
It is very exciting because
friends will be together.
We will have a lot of fun.
Join us!!
For more information: Sophia Bandley
(Maths Teacher)
-05011234567
Future Schools
Tuesday, July 30
5:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.
soru_metni: Classmates come together on July 30 because - - - -.

secenekler.A: some of them like activities
secenekler.B: they like playing games together
secenekler.C: their teachers want to organize a party
secenekler.D: there is an organization on Friendship Day

soru_metni: According to the saying on the card, your best friend can count on you because - - - -.

secenekler.A: you always support him/her
secenekler.B: you can organize a meeting together
secenekler.C: you have a lot of fun with your teachers
secenekler.D: your friends come together on Friendship Day

kontext:
Do you know Mark Twain and Nikola Tesla? I’m sure you do!
Mark Twain (1835-1910) wrote many books, and Nikola Tesla (1856-1943)
was a famous scientist. They met in New York in 1880s. They spent
a lot of time together, and they shared a lot of ideas. When they were
in different countries, they wrote letters to each other to keep in touch.
Tesla loved Twain’s books, and Twain respected Tesla’s scientific work.
Tesla invited Twain to his lab for a special day when he conducted
an important experiment
soru_metni: We can understand from the text that Mark Twain and Nikola Tesla - - - -.

secenekler.A: had the same jobs
secenekler.B: were good friends

kontext:
We are leaving school and organizing a great event.
We hope to see all of you there!
There is food, music, dance, and lots of fun!
Date: Sunday, July 7
Time: 9 p.m. to 11 p.m.
Location: City Hotel,
 Bridge Street
Contact person: Jack Smith
(jack_smith@jmail.com)
Ticket price: $25 per person
soru_metni: The invitation card is for a/an - - - -.

secenekler.A: school lunch
secenekler.B: birthday party

kontext:
Nathalie: Hi, Sophie. How are you?
Sophie: Thank you, Nathalie. What about you?
Nathalie: We are meeting at a café for Jane’s birthday on Sunday evening. Can you come?
Sophie: I am really busy but I will be there. I don’t know where the café is. Can you text me its address, please?
Nathalie: Sure.
soru_metni: According to the conversation, Sophie ---.

secenekler.A: tells Nathalie what she is doing now
secenekler.B: makes an excuse for not going there
secenekler.C: cannot go there because she is busy
secenekler.D: asks for some details about the event

- Honest
- Responsible
- Adventurous
- Generous
- Kind

secenekler.A: She always says “please” and tells the truth.
secenekler.B: She buys presents for her friends.

kontext:
[ARTHUR'S WEEKLY PLAN]
Monday (6 pm - 8 pm): Going to the tennis course
Tuesday (7 pm - 9 pm): Attending John’s party
Wednesday (5 pm - 8 pm): Taking care of my brother
Thursday (4 pm - 6 pm): Training for the tournament

Blake: We are planning to gather on Monday. Will you come?
Arthur: What time?
Blake: At 4 pm.
Arthur: - - - -.

secenekler.A: It is awesome but I will be at John’s party
secenekler.B: I’d love to but I have to leave before six
secenekler.C: That sounds great but I have to train for the tournament
secenekler.D: I am sorry but I am taking care of my brother at that time

kontext:
Dean is organizing a chess tournament on Sunday. He sent messages to his friends to invite them. Here are their
responses:
Tina : I will definitely be there. You have no chance to win.
Sam : That sounds great, but I will be out of the town at the weekend.
Clark : That’s a good idea. Text me about the time.
Peter : I’d love to join, but I have football training. I can join you after it.
soru_metni: According to the conversation above, which of the following is CORRECT?

secenekler.A: Tina isn’t interested in playing chess.
secenekler.B: Sam has to attend a course, so he can’t join the tournament.
secenekler.C: Clark needs extra information about the event.
secenekler.D: Peter is available all day on Sunday.

kontext:
[BACKGROUND INFO]
Sarah likes comedy films and science fiction movies. However, she finds dramas unbearable. Her 14 year old son, Tim, is fond of watching action movies and comedies. He also thinks science fiction movies are interesting. Sarah wants to go to the cinema on Sunday morning with her son. She wants to find a movie that is appropriate for both of their preferences.

[WEBSITE: MOVIE LIST]
1. Ridiculous Man
   - Genre: Comedy
   - Age: 6+
   - Sessions: 10:30 am / 9 pm

2. Out of the World
   - Genre: Science fiction
   - Age: 10+
   - Sessions: 4 pm / 11 pm

3. Impressive Life
   - Genre: Drama
   - Age: 13+
   - Sessions: 10 am / 10 pm

4. Last Two Hours
   - Genre: Action
   - Age: 16+
   - Sessions: 10:30 am / 11:30 pm
soru_metni: According to the information above, which of the following is an appropriate movie for Sarah and Tim?

secenekler.A: Ridiculous Man
secenekler.B: Out of the World

kontext:
Alice invites her friends for some activities. Here is the table of invitations and answers:

1. Activity: Going trekking
   - Day: Monday
   - Invitee: Sally
   - Answer: "I’d love to but I can’t."

2. Activity: Cycling
   - Day: Wednesday
   - Invitee: Jane
   - Answer: "Yeah, why not?"

3. Activity: Drinking something at a cafe
   - Day: Saturday
   - Invitee: Mary
   - Answer: "Sure, it sounds great."
soru_metni: Which of the following does NOT have an answer in the table above?

secenekler.A: Which activity is at the weekend?
secenekler.B: When does Alice want to ride a bike ?
secenekler.C: Who refuses the offer giving a reason?
secenekler.D: How many people accept the invitation?

kontext:

Title: SUMMER CAMP

[ACTIVITIES]
- Trekking
- Fishing
- Sitting around the fire
- Playing board games

secenekler.A: Which equipment do we need?
secenekler.B: Which activities can we do?

kontext:
Alice’s best friend, Sally, invites her to an art exhibition on Sunday. She really wants to go, but her mother’s birthday
party is on the same day. So, Alice sends her a message to apologize and explain why she cannot attend the event.
soru_metni: Which of the following CANNOT be Alice’s message?

secenekler.A:
Thanks for the invitation. I’d love to
but I can’t make it. I’m busy
at the weekend. Have a great time!
secenekler.B:
Hey Sally, I was so happy to receive your
invitation. I always have fun at exhibitions,
but on that day, I have to be at a birthday party
secenekler.C:
Thanks a lot! I cannot refuse your invitation
because I love you and I love art. I will text
you to learn the details in the evening.
secenekler.D:
Dear Sally, that's very kind of you! I really want
to come, but I am afraid I cannot. I must join
another special event on that da.

kontext:
[POSTER]
LET’S GO BACK TO
SCHOOL(CLASS of 2015)
Ticket : $15 (food included)
Date : October, 23rd
Time : 7 p.m.
Place : Shine Café
For details: 055098765430 (Dean)
soru_metni: Which of the following is CORRECT according to the poster above?

secenekler.A: You have to bring your own food.
secenekler.B: For more information, you can call Dean.
secenekler.C: If you want to attend the event, you must pay $50.
secenekler.D: To join, you should be at Shine Café in the morning.

kontext:
[TABLE NAME] : Personal characteristics of Charlotte’s close friends
[TABLE]
Anabel:generous,helpful,amusing
Britney:honest,serious,kind
[CONVERSATION]
Daisy : Does Anabel back you up when you need her?
Charlotte : Yes, she does. (I) She always supports me. (II) I think she is also a funny girl, and she likes making jokes.
Daisy : What about Britney?
Charlotte : (III) I think she is so nice to her friends. (IV) However, she rarely tells the truth, so I don’t think that I can
count on her.
soru_metni: Which sentence(s) in the conversation does NOT match the personal characteristics in the Table 1?

secenekler.A: Only I
secenekler.B: I and IV

kontext:
[CONVERSATION]
Gary : I am organizing a movie night at home on Sunday evening. Who wants to join?
Jenny : Great idea. I don’t have any plans on that day.
Amy : That sounds awesome, unfortunately, I do not think I can come.
Joe : Thanks for inviting me, but my brother is coming on that day.
soru_metni: Which of the following is NOT correct according to the conversation above?

secenekler.A: Gary is having a birthday party
secenekler.B: Jenny is going to attend the event.
secenekler.C: Amy refuses the invitation without making an excuse.
secenekler.D: Joe will be with a guest on Sunday.

kontext:
[CONVERSATION]
Dean: I want to laugh when I watch a film, so I like funny films.
Sam: Movies about the future and space are my favourite ones.
Lily: I like movies about other planets.
Charlie: I prefer watching movies about difficult situations in real life.
soru_metni: According to the conversation above, who likes the same type of movies?

secenekler.A: Dean and Sam
secenekler.B: Dean and Charlie

kontext:
[SABRINA'S SPEECH]
Sabrina: "I have a true friend in my class. She never tells lies and always keeps my secrets. She often makes jokes. We generally get on well with each other because we share the same hobbies. We usually ride a bike and go to the cinema together. I like spending time with her."

[FRIENDS' CHARACTERISTICS]
1. Mary:
   - Personal quality: generous & honest
   - Favourite activity: playing team sports

2. Rose:
   - Personal quality: funny & polite
   - Favourite activity: going to concerts

3. Sally:
   - Personal quality: polite & generous
   - Favourite activity: doing sports

4. Jane:
   - Personal quality: honest & funny
   - Favourite activity: watching films
soru_metni: According to the information above, who is Sabrina’s best friend?

secenekler.A: Mary
secenekler.B: Rose

kontext:
Emma answered some questions about her buddies. Here are her answers:	

1) Who always tells the truth and keeps your secrets?
Ann and Sophie
2) Who backs you up when you need help?
Claire and Jack
3) Who do you get on really well with?
Claire
4) Who always makes jokes and makes you laugh?
Ann and Jack
soru_metni: Emma thinks that - - - -.

secenekler.A: only one person supports her when she needs help
secenekler.B: Sophie and Claire are helpful and kind
secenekler.C: all of her friends are amusing
secenekler.D: Ann is both funny and honest

kontext:
Jack : What do you think of Tim?
 Mary : I think he is the best person in our office because he always supports us.
 George : He never lies to us, so we can count on him.
 Ted : He also says ‘please’ when he wants us to do something.
soru_metni: According to the conversation above, which of the following is NOT one of the characteristics of Tim?

secenekler.A: Amusing
secenekler.B: Helpful

kontext:
[SCENARIO]
Miss Cooper, an English teacher, and her students prepare a learning wall in their class. Rule: Students can share ONLY their positive opinions about their friends on this wall.

[STUDENTS' NOTES ON THE WALL]
1. From Tom (to Nancy): "You are so energetic while learning and trying new things."
2. From Sally (to Debra): "What a funny girl you are! You always make us smile."
3. From Mike (to Robert): "You need to be more careful because you sometimes share our secrets with other people."
4. From Sophie (to Kevin): "You are the most honest person in our class. Your friends can always count on you."
5. From Betty (to Lucy): "I rarely spend time with you because you are not careful about how you speak to your friends."
soru_metni: Whose notes should NOT be on the learning wall according to the information above?

secenekler.A: Tom and Betty’s
secenekler.B: Sally and Mike’s

kontext:
[SCENARIO]
Jack has two tickets for a jazz concert, and he invites William to join the event with him.

[WILLIAM'S PLANS FOR SUNDAY]
- 10 am - 12 am: Attend basketball training
- 1 pm - 3 pm: Do homework
- 3 pm - 5 pm: Help dad water the garden
- 6 pm - 8 pm: Have dinner with grandparents

[TICKET DETAILS]
Event: JAZZ CONCERT
Location: City Concert Hall
Date: October 24 Sunday
Time: 7 pm
soru_metni: According to the information above, how can William respond to Jack’s invitation?

secenekler.A: I’m sorry but I can’t come because I have basketball training.
secenekler.B: I’d really love to but we are having dinner with my grandparents.
secenekler.C: Thanks for the invitation but I have to finish my homework then.
secenekler.D: That would be great but I’m going to help my father.

kontext:
[CONVERSATION]
Dad: Do you have a plan for Saturday, Brian?
Brian: I’m going to do sports in the morning and then go to a rock concert.
Mom: Are you doing both activities with one of your friends?
Brian: Yes, ---- is coming with me because we have the same interests.

[BRIAN'S BUDDIES AND THEIR FAVOURITE FREE TIME ACTIVITIES]
1. Mark: Chatting online, Taking photos
2. Steve: Going shopping, Riding a bike
3. Tom: Listening to music, Playing basketball
4. Nick: Going on a picnic, Attending concerts
soru_metni: Which of the following completes the conversation according to the information above?

secenekler.A: Mark
secenekler.B: Steve

kontext:
Olivia and her friends are looking at a job advertisement. Below you see the job advertisement and some information about the candidates.

[JOB ADVERTISEMENT: SECRETARY WANTED]
Company: Dimple Company
- Age: 25-35 years old
- Experience: at least 3 years of work experience
- Personality: nice to people, support people when they need something, pay attention to what s/he is doing (careful).

[CANDIDATES]
1. Olivia:
   - Age: 38
   - Experience: 4 years
   - Characteristics: Kind, Funny, Honest, Friendly

2. Harry:
   - Age: 28
   - Experience: 2 years
   - Characteristics: Social, Helpful, Serious, Generous

3. George:
   - Age: 30
   - Experience: 5 years
   - Characteristics: Social, Kind, Helpful, Careful

4. Amelia:
   - Age: 33
   - Experience: 3 years
   - Characteristics: Serious, Kind, Honest, Energetic
soru_metni: According to the information above, who is the most appropriate person for the job?

secenekler.A: Olivia
secenekler.B: Harry

kontext:
Mr. Walker plans to buy tickets for a play. He says:
Mr. Walker : There is a play at 7 pm on Friday. How about watching it together?
Mrs. Walker : Sure, that would be great.
Olivia : I’m busy but I can’t say no.
Oliver : It sounds good but I have to attend an online course.
Owen : Yeah, why not?
soru_metni: According to the conversation above, how many tickets is Mr. Walker going to buy?

kontext:
A hundred people joined a survey to find the most important characteristics of an ideal friend. Here are the results:

[SURVEY RESULTS: IMPORTANT CHARACTERISTICS]
- Kind: 45 people
- Funny: 25 people
- Generous: 20 people
- Helpful: 10 people
soru_metni: Which of the following statements is NOT correct according to the results above?

secenekler.A: Telling the truth is the key to an ideal friendship.
secenekler.B: Helping other people is less popular than making jokes.
secenekler.C: Being nice to people is the most important characteristic of a friend
secenekler.D: Sharing things with friends is one of the characteristics of a good friend

kontext:
Alice plans a birthday party on Sunday evening and invites her friends. Here are her friends’ answers:

Sally: That sounds great but I am going to a jazz concert.
Julia: I’m sorry but I can’t join you on Sunday night.
Anna: I love parties, but I can’t. I have to take care of my little sister.
Sophia: It sounds nice but I have to leave before 6 pm.
Rose: I’d love to but my grandparents will visit us at the weekend.
Alexis: A birthday party? I can’t say no. Do you need any help?
soru_metni: Who refuses the invitation by giving an excuse?

secenekler.A: Alexis, Sally, and Julia
secenekler.B: Julia, Sophia, and Rose

kontext:
Mary organizes a graduation party and sends her friends an invitation card. After Laura looks at the invitation, she texts Mary to get some more information about the event.

[INVITATION CARD]
Event: JOIN OUR GRADUATION PARTY (Class of 2020)
Date: Friday 19 June
Location: Happy Garden (123 Main Street, 22 Eastmont Drive, CA)
Price: $15 Each person
soru_metni: According to the information above, which of the following can be Laura’s message to Mary?

secenekler.A: How much do we have to pay?
secenekler.B: What time is the party going to start?
secenekler.C: Where is the party going to take place?
secenekler.D: When is the event going to be?

kontext:
[CAROL'S INTERESTS]
- Listening to music
- Doing sports
- Doing outdoor activities
- Watching new plays

[CONVERSATION]
Alice: Are you free on Sunday, Carol?
Carol: Yeah.
Alice: - - - -?
Carol: Sure, I really would like that.

secenekler.B: What about cycling together

kontext:
The researcher, Professor Barclay, conducts researches about teenagers. His last research was about teenagers’ daily routines. He compared young people in England with those in Korea.

[VISUAL DATA: NUMBER OF TEENAGERS PER ACTIVITY]
1. English Teenagers (Total 10 people):
   - Going Online (Blue Icon): 6 people
   - Doing Sports (Yellow Icon): 2 people
   - Studying / Reading Books (Pink Icon): 2 people
   - Artistic Activities (Green Icon): 0 people

2. Korean Teenagers (Total 10 people):
   - Going Online (Blue Icon): 2 people
   - Doing Sports (Yellow Icon): 2 people
   - Artistic Activities (Green Icon): 2 people
   - Studying / Reading Books (Pink Icon): 4 people
soru_metni: Which of the following is CORRECT according to the research results?

secenekler.A: Korean teens are more interested in sports than English teens are.
secenekler.B: Korean teens spend less time studying than English teens do.
secenekler.C: English teens’ favourite activity is going online.

kontext:
The researcher, Professor Barclay, conducts researches about teenagers. His last research was about teenagers’ daily routines. He compared young people in England with those in Korea.

[VISUAL DATA: NUMBER OF TEENAGERS PER ACTIVITY]
1. English Teenagers (Total 10 people):
   - Going Online (Blue Icon): 6 people
   - Doing Sports (Yellow Icon): 2 people

2. Korean Teenagers (Total 10 people):
   - Going Online (Blue Icon): 2 people

kontext:
There was a rock concert of a famous singer last weekend. After the concert, some people wrote notes and threw them
to the singer. Here are the comments:

SAM:It’s the worst performance I’ve ever
seen. Your behavior during the concert
was insulting

JANE:I think your concert was magnificent.
At the end of the concert, I was
really happy.

JOHN:Your music is impressive.
I cannot stop listening to your songs.

MARY:Your concerts are always terrific.
I am fond of your voice.
soru_metni: Whose comment was disappointing for the singer?

secenekler.A: Sam
secenekler.B: John

kontext:
The pie chart below shows the results of a study on the favorite free time activities of 100 teens.

[PIE CHART DATA: Favorite Free Time Activities]
- Use social media: 55%
- Meet friends: 20%
- Listen to music: 15%
- Do sports: 5%
- Go to the cinema: 5%
soru_metni: Which of the following is CORRECT according to the information above?

secenekler.A: Watching movies is the most favourite activity of the teens.
secenekler.B: Doing exercise is very popular among the teens
secenekler.C: The teens usually spend their time on the Net.
secenekler.D: The teenagers never listen to music.

kontext:
Brian and Jenny want to do something different this weekend. Here is the list of their types of interests:

[BRIAN'S INTERESTS]
- Technology
- Books
- Paintings

[JENNY'S INTERESTS]
- Sculpture
- Sports

kontext:
Alice, David, Mary, and Tom are planning different free time activities for this week.

[PEOPLE'S PLANS]
- Alice: going to the cinema with her friends.
- Tom: going to the café with his buddies.
- David: going to ride a bike in the morning.
- Mary: going to play bowling after school.

[WEEKLY SCHEDULE]
- Monday: Doing sports
- Thursday: Meeting friends
- Saturday: Cycling
- Sunday: Watching a movie
soru_metni: According to the information above, who is NOT planning an activity for the weekend?

secenekler.A: Mary and Alice
secenekler.B: Mary and Tom

kontext:
[FRANK'S ROUTINE]
Hello. My name is Frank. I’m 14 years old and a student in 8th grade. On weekdays, I get up at 7:30. I wash my hands and face before I have breakfast with my family. I go to school at 8:40. After school, I like reading books and playing chess with my brother, David. I usually read detective books. I don’t like biographical books. My friends and I play basketball on Saturday afternoons. We have lots of fun together. I do my
soru_metni: Which of the following does NOT have an answer in the text?

secenekler.A: What kind of games does Frank like playing?
secenekler.B: What time does he get up on Tuesdays?
secenekler.C: What does he do before the breakfast?

kontext:
[SCENARIO]
Simon is planning to go to a book fair on Saturday afternoon with his friends. He sends his friends a message to invite them to the fair.

[FRIENDS' PLANS FOR SATURDAY]
1. Betty:
   - Activity: going to a concert with Jane
   - Time: 4 pm - 7 pm

2. Carl:
   - Activity: visiting grandparents
   - Time: 10 am - 1 pm

3. Tom:
   - Activity: doing sports
   - Time: 9 am - 12 pm

4. Lily:
   - Activity: seeing a new play
   - Time: 3 pm - 7 pm
soru_metni: According to the information above, which of the following is NOT an appropriate reply to Simon’s invitation?

secenekler.A:
Hi, buddy.
That’s a good
idea. I can join
you after my
football training
secenekler.B:
Simon, the
activity sounds
a bit boring, but
I will be there
after our family
breakfast.
secenekler.C:
Hello, Simon.
That’s really
awesome but
I will go to the
cinema with my
sister.
secenekler.D:
Hey, that’s cool
but in the
afternoon I will
go and listen to
my favourite
band.

kontext:
[TIM'S SITUATION]
Tim: I have to stay home to be safe because of COVID-19. Being at home is a bit difficult, so I am trying to do different things every day. Here are my favourite activities for each day:

[TIM'S WEEKLY PLAN]
- Monday: Listening to my favourite band
- Tuesday: Practising my French
- Wednesday: Trying new recipes with my mum
- Thursday: Playing chess with my dad
- Friday: Watching a pop concert
- Saturday: Joining an online drawing course
- Sunday: Painting
soru_metni:
Complete the sentence:
Tim - - - -.

secenekler.A: spends time only with his mum
secenekler.B: listens to music only once a week

kontext:
[POSTER: CHESS 2021 TOURNAMENT]
Event: CHESS Tournament 2021
Slogan: Come and Play at a Great Tournament! Invite Friends and Family to Come and Watch! Make New Friends!
Details: OPEN TO ALL

Location: Pine School Sports Hall
Time: 9 am - 5 pm

secenekler.B: place

kontext:
Gloria loves reading in her free time. She shares her ideas about the books she reads on her blog every month. Here is this month’s blog posts:

[BOOK DESCRIPTIONS]
1. "In this book, you can discover amazing places and different cultures." (Theme: Travel/Culture)
2. "While reading this book, you will feel like you are walking in space." (Theme: Space)
3. "Do you like trying new things? Then, this book is just for you as it teaches you new and interesting cooking methods." (Theme: Cooking)
4. "In this awesome book, you will learn how the experiences of a disabled person changed many other people’s lives." (Theme: Biography/Life Story)

[BOOK COVERS IN OPTIONS]
- A) The Challenging Life of a Woman
- B) A Trip out of the World
- C) Tasty Recipes
- D) Dangerous Animals
soru_metni: Which of the following is NOT one of the books that Gloria discusses in her blog?

secenekler.A: The Challenging Life of a Woman
secenekler.B: A Trip out of the World

kontext:
[CONVERSATION]
Daisy: What do you like doing in your free time?
Janet: I don’t miss any plays. I am also fond of jazz and pop, but I dislike playing an instrument and playing team sports.
Sam: I enjoy buying new things. I also like doing sports. However, painting and seeing a play are unbearable for me.
soru_metni: According to the conversation above, which of the following are the most appropriate activities for Janet and Sam?

secenekler.A: Janet: playing volleyball / Sam: going to the shopping mall
secenekler.B: Janet: watching a play / Sam: going to the theatre
secenekler.C: Janet: swimming / Sam: watching a play
secenekler.D: Janet: listening to music, going to the theatre / Sam: cycling, going shopping

kontext:
We conducted a survey about the music preferences of 100 boys and 100 girls in our school, and here are the results:

[BOYS' PREFERENCES]
- Classical: 10%
- Folk: 15%
- Jazz: 15%
- Pop: 40%
- Rap: 20%

[GIRLS' PREFERENCES]
- Classical: 5%
- Folk: 15%
- Jazz: 10%
- Pop: 55%
- Rap: 15%
soru_metni: Which of the following is CORRECT according to the information above?

secenekler.A: Girls listen to jazz and folk music more than boys do.
secenekler.B: More than half of the girls prefer listening to pop music.
secenekler.C: Rap music is the most popular kind of music for both groups.
secenekler.D: Both boys and girls like classical music at the same rate.

kontext:
The table below shows what Dean and his friends prefer doing at weekends.

[WEEKEND PREFERENCES]
1. Dean:
   - Going to a concert
   - Going to parties
2. Sam:
   - Seeing a movie
   - Doing shopping
3. Sarah:
   - Staying at home
   - Taking piano lessons
4. Hannah:
   - Training for the tournament
   - Going to the cinema
soru_metni: According to the information above, which of the following is CORRECT?

secenekler.A: Sarah and Hannah enjoy attending parties.
secenekler.B: Sam and Dean love watching films
secenekler.C: Dean and Sarah are interested in music.
secenekler.D: Hannah and Sam like spending time at home.

kontext:
Success High School teachers prepare the following form to find out their students’ interests.

[ACTIVITY FORM]
- Tuesday: Riding a bicycle, Playing volleyball
- Thursday: Planting trees, Cleaning up the forest
- Saturday: Visiting a space station, Working on a DNA model
- Sunday: Going to the theatre, Visiting a museum
soru_metni: According to the information above, which of the following is NOT correct?

secenekler.A: Students can try extreme sports on Tuesday.
secenekler.B: There will be environmental activities on Thursday.
secenekler.C: Activities on Saturday are related to science.
secenekler.D: Students can take part in cultural activities on Sunday.

kontext:
In their English class, students ask each other questions and write down their answers. Below are John’s notes:

[CLASS SURVEY: My friends in the class who...]
- like camping and trekking: Terry, Harry, Emily (3 people)
- enjoy going to concerts: Patricia, Sophie
- love visiting book fairs: Larry
- dislike arguing with friends: Carl, Alan
- hate eating fast food: Bobby
soru_metni: According to the information above, which of the following is CORRECT?

secenekler.A: Four people enjoy doing outdoor activities.
secenekler.B: Both Patricia and Larry like listening to music.
secenekler.C: Carl and Alan never get on well with their friends.
secenekler.D: Only one person prefers vegetables to hamburgers.

kontext:
[BUSY HOURS AT FLOWER RESTAURANT - WEDNESDAY]
- 9:00 -> Low
- 12:00 -> High (Busy)
- 15:00 -> Medium
- 18:00 -> Very High (Very Busy)
- 21:00 -> Very Low (Not Busy)

[CONVERSATION]
Claire: Hello, honey. Shall we go to the Flower Restaurant on Wednesday?
Gabrielle: Great idea! However, because of COVID-19, we should choose a time when there are not many people.
Claire: Don't worry. I checked, and I know when the busy hours of the restaurant are. I think we should go there - - - -.
soru_metni: According to the information, which of the following completes the conversation correctly?

secenekler.A: for breakfast
secenekler.B: to have dinner after 7 pm

kontext:
Kimberly, Matthew, Laura, and Vincent want to attend a teen camp. They try to find a camp matching their interests.

[BROCHURE: SUMMER CAMPS]
1. Technology Camp (24-30 June)
2. Language Camp (1-30 July)
3. Adventure Camp (6-18 August)
4. Forests Clean-up Camp (12-21 August)

[STUDENTS' INTERESTS]
- Kimberly: spending time in nature, trekking, climbing mountains.
- Matthew: exploring other cultures and learning Spanish.
- Laura: teaching children, saving the environment.
- Vincent: theatre, music, and dance.
soru_metni: Which student’s interests do NOT match any of the camps on the brochure?

secenekler.A: Kimberly
secenekler.B: Matthew

kontext:
[ALICE'S WEEKLY PLAN]
- Monday: Going to the hospital at 3 pm
- Tuesday: Meeting friends at the cafe
- Wednesday: Volleyball training
- Thursday: Doing shopping with mum
- Friday: Emily’s birthday party
soru_metni: Which of the following does NOT have an answer in Alice’s weekly plan?

secenekler.A: When is Alice going to be in the hospital?
secenekler.B: Where is Alice going to see her friends?
secenekler.C: Who is going to take Alice after training?
secenekler.D: What is Alice going to do on Thursday?

kontext:
[SCENARIO]
Mr. and Mrs. Clark have two children, Jack and Julia. As a family, they spend the weekends together and always do the activities that their children love.

[CHILDREN'S PREFERENCES]
1. Jack:
   - Likes: Nature, Every kind of sports
   - Dislikes: Music

2. Julia:
   - Likes: Different kinds of music, Outdoor activities
   - Dislikes: Watching films
soru_metni: Which of the following CANNOT be the list of the activities for this weekend?

secenekler.A: Saturday: Cleaning up the forest / Sunday: Camping
secenekler.B: Saturday: Climbing a mountain / Sunday: Riding a horse
secenekler.D: Saturday: Having a picnic / Sunday: Attending a concert
